content: The Lord, the Psalmist’s Portion in Life and Salvation in Death.
I said to the , “You are my Lord;
I have nothing good besides You.”
As for the saints who are on the earth,
They are the majestic ones; all my delight is in them.
The pains of those who have acquired another  will be multiplied;
I will not pour out their drink offerings of blood,
Nor will I take their names upon my lips.
